alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 4:49AM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult along Interstate 15 between Baker and Primm, specifically over Mountain Pass.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve
